verses.roman:
tām āpatantīṁ bhagavān
pradyumno gadayā gadām
apāsya śatrave kruddhaḥ
prāhiṇot sva-gadāṁ nṛpa

synonyms: tām—that; āpatantīm—flying toward Him; bhagavān—the Supreme Lord; pradyumnaḥ—Pradyumna; gadayā—with His club; gadām—the club; apāsya—driving off; śatrave—at His enemy; kruddhaḥ—angered; prāhiṇot—He threw; sta-gadām—His own club; nṛpa—O King (Parīkṣit).
translation: As Śambara's club came flying toward Him, Lord Pradyumna knocked it away with His own. Then, O King, Pradyumna angrily threw His club at the enemy.
